definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

pinyin: ke3 ca1 xie3 ke3 bian1 cheng2 zhi1 du2 cun2 chu3 qi4
containing_words.word: 可擦寫可編程只讀存儲器

sentences.english: It analyses a technology named indirect programmable trapping wave.
sentences.chinese: 詳細地分析了一種新型的可編程陷波技術。

sentences.english: Programmability is the future of electronic system design.
sentences.chinese: 可編程性是電子系統設計的前景。

sentences.english: JDMPLC-1 is a new programable logic controller, for modern automatic control systems.
sentences.chinese: 是一種面向現代控制系統的微型可編程控制器。

sentences.english: A tool for programming non-volatile memories and other electrically-programmable devices.
sentences.chinese: 用來揮發內存和電可編程設備編程的工具。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a solution of PTI (Programmable Transport Interface) of set-top-box system.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種數字機頂盒系統中可編程傳輸接口的方案。

sentences.english: You need more sophisticated programmability or a different security model.
sentences.chinese: 您需要更成熟的可編程性或不同的安全性模型。

sentences.english: It is programmable, with user-defined variables and functions.
sentences.chinese: 這是可編程的，與用戶定義的變量和功能。

sentences.english: PLC programmed controller, 7' color touch screen, man-machine interface.
sentences.chinese: 採用PLC可編程控制器，7英寸彩色液晶觸摸屏。

sentences.english: It has been shown that the use of the new circuit can reduce the size of the MVPLA.
sentences.chinese: 這種電路減少了所設計多值可編程邏輯陣列的規模。

sentences.english: The electric control box of complex equipment is being replaced by PLC.
sentences.chinese: 複雜設備的電氣控制箱正在被可編程控制器所代替。

sentences.english: Consider a programmable thermostat to raise and lower the temperature at pre-set times.
sentences.chinese: 使用可編程的恆溫器以便在預設的時間自動升降溫。

sentences.english: Low Power, Single Resistor Gain Programmable, Micropower Precision Instrumentation Amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 低功耗，單電阻增益可編程，微精密儀表放大器。

sentences.english: Power, Single Resistor Gain Programmable, Micropower Precision Instrumentation Amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 電源，單電阻增益可編程，微精密儀表放大器。

sentences.english: A control system of fault simulation is developed based on PLC.
sentences.chinese: 開發了以可編程控制器爲核心的故障模擬控制系統。

sentences.english: This paper describes a programmable timing electric circuit based on multi-level counters, including three pieces of Counter IC and CMOS Gate IC.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於計數器的可編程定時電路。

sentences.english: The lockset is keypad programmable and has 26D American Levers.
sentences.chinese: 該鎖有可編程的小鍵盤和26D美式撬槓。
